```py
>>> np.round([0.37, 1.64])
array([0., 2.])
>>> np.round([0.37, 1.64], decimals=1)
array([0.4, 1.6])
>>> np.round([.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5]) # rounds to nearest even value
array([0., 2., 2., 4., 4.])
>>> np.round([1,2,3,11], decimals=1) # ndarray of ints is returned
array([ 1,  2,  3, 11])
>>> np.round([1,2,3,11], decimals=-1)
array([ 0,  0,  0, 10]) 
```
